author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-U.S. Energy Corp Reports Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.03
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - US Energy Corp:
* U.S. ENERGY CORP. ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * US ENERGY CORP -QTRLY PRODUCTION OF 37,413 BOE, OR DAILY PRODUCTION OF 416 BOEPD, A 5% SEQUENTIAL INCREASE
* US ENERGY CORP - REVENUES FROM SALES OF OIL AND NATURAL GAS DURING Q1 2018 WERE $1.6 MILLION VS $1.7 MILLION DURING THE Q1 2017
* US ENERGY CORP - QTRLY SHR LOSS $0.03 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
